column2: "Dark Falz readings, eliminated... But why'd he suddenly show up in our world...?"
"...Haha, so you came to us for answers?"
"We are fundamentally different from [Persona], after all."
"They're in your body. No point askin' us about 'em."
"It's true they appeared to lend you aid within Omega. But [Persona] does not exist here."
"I wonder if the [Persona] you just encountered was drawn here by the remnants within yourself."
"The [Persona] you fought did not possess a soul. They were merely a hollow shell."
"Nevertheless, they were still a Dark Falz. Left alone, they would consume everything."
"ARKS couldn't... No, you couldn't possibly ignore that, could you?"
"A real big threat showed up, but your problems keep coming."
"Yeah, lotsa problems. Why do they all show up wherever you go?"
"...Well, do your best out there. If you die, I'll disappear too."
